'''Jasper Boerstra''', also known as '''Jappa''' or '''JAPPA''', is a full time employee who is currently working for [[Mojang Studios]] as an Art Director<ref>{{Tweet|JasperBoerstra|1521221569795743751|I'm happy to announce I'm the Art Director for Minecraft now. What this means is that I'll be making less art but focusing on the overarching strategy, developing the art team and making guidelines to communicate what makes Minecraft art so great and how to replicate it. üéâ|May 2, 2022}}</ref> for ''[[Minecraft]]''. He was hired to change the great majority of the old textures in the game. Most of his changes to the game's textures took effect in the [[Texture Update]], and he has since continued to create textures for new [[block]]s, [[item]]s, and [[entity|entities]]. He also spearheaded the [[Vibrant Visuals]] project.<ref>https://news.xbox.com/en-us/2025/03/25/minecraft-vibrant-visuals</ref>
